description: The Smart Book w/ Plastic Back Cover for iPad features a smart function that puts your iPad to sleep when closed and wakes it up when it is opened.  It has a slim fit design with magnetic panels and folds to create two different stands for watching slide shows, movies, or typing.  The case allows full access to the screen, buttons, and ports of your iPad and also has a hard plastic back cover that protects the back of your iPad 2.
title: iHome   Smart Book with Plastic Back Cover for iPad 2 - Red (IH-IP1160R)
